attributes.action: Call for a Vote of No Confidence in the Current Conservative Government.
attributes.additional_details:
This demonstrates the current government DO NOT represent the majority of the population in Great Britain. Therefore we the people of the UK call for a vote of no confidence in the current government in preparation for an early general election. 

In moving forward the people of Britain deserve to hear which party can propose the best position for us in this new situation in the World. We deserve to democratically elect who will lead us to a successful divorce with the EU.
attributes.background: Britain has voted to LEAVE the European Union. As the elected leader representing the ruling Conservative Party; David Cameron has supported the proposition to REMAIN in the EU. Therefore the people of Great Britain have voted against this current governments position.
